# EmoteCraft

:::tip Available on servers
**Overnight**
:::

**EmoteCraft** â€” client-side mod for Minecraft that adds an emotion and animation system. On Overnight server, a plugin is installed that allows players to see each other's emotions.

---

## ğŸ˜Š What is it?

EmoteCraft is a mod based on the client-side mod **EmoteCraft**, which adds the ability to use various emotions and animations in-game.

**How it works:**
- ğŸ­ **Client mod** â€” you use emotions through the mod on client
- ğŸ”— **Server plugin** â€” plugin on server allows seeing other players' emotions
- ğŸ‘¥ **Synchronization** â€” all players with the mod see each other's emotions

---

## ğŸ“‹ Requirements

### For Client

1. **EmoteCraft Mod** â€” install the mod on client
   - Download from [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/emotecraft) or [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/emotecraft)
   - Compatible with Fabric and Forge

2. **Compatible Minecraft Version** â€” check compatibility on mod page

### For Server

- **EmoteCraft** plugin is installed on Overnight server
- Plugin synchronizes emotions between players

---

## ğŸ­ Available Emotions

EmoteCraft includes a standard set of emotions and animations. You can also install additional emotion packs to expand capabilities.

:::info Full List
Full list of available emotions can be seen in-game via mod interface (usually `B` key).
:::

---

## ğŸ’¡ How to Use

1. **Install EmoteCraft mod** on client
2. **Launch Minecraft** with installed mod
3. **Connect to server** `overnight.wilderion.ru`
4. **Use emotions** through mod interface (usually `B` key)

:::tip Tip
Emotes are great for creating screenshots, videos, and just having fun with friends!
:::

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Do all players see my emotions?**</summary>

Yes, all players with EmoteCraft mod installed will see your emotions. Players without the mod won't see animations.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Do I need to install anything on the server?**</summary>

No, the plugin is already installed on Overnight server. You only need to install the mod on client.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can I use emotions without the mod?**</summary>

No, you need to install the client-side EmoteCraft mod to use emotions.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Does it work with other mods?**</summary>

Yes, EmoteCraft is compatible with most other mods. Check compatibility on mod page.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Where to download the mod?**</summary>

The mod can be downloaded from [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/emotecraft) or [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/emotecraft).

</details>
